page.title: 19Education
page.content: Our school has got a computer room.A lot of my friends have got their own "home computer" but mainly use it to play games.My favourite lessons are computer studies,science,games,art, woodwork and YM (yearmaster period). In YM we play games like football, non-stop cricket,battleships,bingo, chess or we have quizzes like blockbusters. We start school at 8:50am and have eight,35 minute lessons each day. Morning break lasts 20 minutes and is followed by a 20 minute assembly. Our school uniform is composed of grey or black trousers, a white or grey shirt,black or dark shoes,a blue tie and a blue blazer with the school badge on it.Dinner break lasts 45 minutes and school ends at 3:20pm. The best school meal is sausage,chips and beans with apple pie and custard.
